author: Vanmala Subramaniam
title: How to get the Canada Emergency Response Benefit — $2,000 every four weeks for up to 16 weeks
description: The basics: you have to reside in Canada, have a Social Insurance Number, be at least 15 years of age and have earned at least $5,000 over the past 12 months
content:
Millions of workers have abruptly become unemployed or had their hours dramatically reduced through no fault of their own since the coronavirus crisis shut down non-essential services across the country,
Many of these workers are self-employed or part of the… [+4189 chars]
